sentences.sCn: 他们的委屈是合乎情理的。

sentences.sContent: The main grievance of the drivers is the imposition of higher fees for driving licences.
sentences.sCn: 司机们的主要不满是加诸在驾驶执照上的更高的费用。

phrases.pCn: 冤屈投诉程序；苦情处理制度；抱怨程序；申诉程序

remMethod.val: griev(悲痛) + ance(表名词) → 委屈

trans.tranCn: 委屈， 抱怨， 牢骚
trans.tranOther: If you have a grievance about something that has happened or been done, you believe that it was unfair
